description.value:
You Interact to sheathe your weapon and enter @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}. Until the end of your turn, your next @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.D6a4phlAxmixy2lo]{Hakaze} that successfully hits will deal the following effect with a @Check[reflex|against:class] saving throw; on a critical hit, the targeted creature will take a -2 circumstance penalty to its save against Kasha. Creatures immune to being disarmed or without a weapon that is not natural are immune to Kasha's effects.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attacks made with the weapon it is holding and to Reflex DCs against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} attempts made against it until the beginning of its next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feat-effects.Item.9Oxoz7c3FrQLtD0C]{Effect: Kasha}

Critical Failure The target drops a item held in one or both hands in an adjacent square.
